BIO

I am an experienced software engineer with a wide range of experience. I have a long background in embedded software development, as well as web development. I bring this unique background to every project I work on.

Enphase Energy

Senior Staff Software Engineer

At Enphase Energy I was the Lead developer for Backbone based web app hosted on gateway device that is used by installers to setup and configure the Enphase System. I worked with UI/UX designers to develop many new features.

  • Wizard to guide users through configuration of powerline meters on the system.
  • Tariff information editor to allow system optimization
  • Ruby on Rails app used to simulate gateway to allow UI development ahead of hardware
